file-list / v-model:file-list.description: 上传的文件列表, 例如: [{ name: 'food.jpg', url: 'https://xxx.cdn.com/xxx.jpg' }]
file-list / v-model:file-list.description_zh: 上传的文件列表, 例如: [{ name: 'food.jpg', url: 'https://xxx.cdn.com/xxx.jpg' }]

header.description: HTTP 请求 Header，Header 中不能设置 Referer，uploadFile 接口详细参数，查看官方手册
header.description_zh: HTTP 请求 Header，Header 中不能设置 Referer，uploadFile 接口详细参数，查看官方手册

limit.description: The maximum number of uploads allowed

show-limit-num.description: If the number of uploads is limited, whether to display the number of uploads
show-limit-num.description_zh: 限制上传个数的情况下，是否展示当前上传的个数

source-type.description: Select the source of the image, choose the detailed parameters of the Image API, and check the official manual
source-type.description_zh: 选择图片的来源，chooseImage 接口详细参数，查看官方手册

size-type.description: For the size of the selected image and the detailed parameters of the chooseImage interface, please refer to the official manual
size-type.description_zh: 所选的图片的尺寸，chooseImage 接口详细参数，查看官方手册

name.description: The key corresponding to the file, the developer can get the binary content of the file through this key on the server, upload the detailed parameters of the File interface, and view the official manual
name.description_zh: 文件对应的 key，开发者在服务端可以通过这个 key 获取文件的二进制内容，uploadFile 接口详细参数，查看官方手册

formData.description: For more information about the additional form data and uploadFile interface parameters in the HTTP request, see the official manual
formData.description_zh: HTTP 请求中其他额外的 form data，uploadFile 接口详细参数，查看官方手册

on-preview-fail.description: The preview failed to perform the action

before-upload.description: The hook before uploading the file, the parameter is the uploaded file and the file list, if it returns false or returns a promise and is rejected, the upload will be stopped.
before-upload.description_zh: 上传文件之前的钩子，参数为上传的文件和文件列表，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则停止上传。

before-choose.description: Select the hook before the image, the parameter is the file list, if false is returned or a Promise is returned and rejected, the upload will be stopped.
before-choose.description_zh: 选择图片之前的钩子，参数为文件列表，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则停止上传。

before-remove.description: The hook before deleting a file, the parameter is the file to be deleted and the file list, if it returns false or returns a promise and is rejected, the upload will be stopped.
before-remove.description_zh: 删除文件之前的钩子，参数为要删除的文件和文件列表，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则停止上传。

before-preview.description: If the checkmark before the image preview is returned false or a Promise is returned and rejected, the upload will be stopped.
before-preview.description_zh: 图片预览前的钩子，参数为预览的图片下标和图片列表，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则停止上传。

build-form-data.description: 构建上传formData的钩子,参数为上传的文件、待处理的formData,返回值为处理后的formData,若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject,则停止上传。
build-form-data.description_zh: 构建上传formData的钩子，参数为上传的文件、待处理的formData，返回值为处理后的formData，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则停止上传。

status-key.description: file data structure, the key corresponding to status
status-key.description_zh: file 数据结构中，status 对应的 key

image-mode.description: Preview the mode property of the image
image-mode.description_zh: 预览图片的 mode 属性

compressed.description: Whether to compress the video, when accept is video | media
compressed.description_zh: 是否压缩视频，当 accept 为 video | media 时生效

maxDuration.description: The maximum shooting time of a video is set to video | media, in seconds
maxDuration.description_zh: 拍摄视频最长拍摄时间，当 accept 为 video | media 时生效，单位秒

camera.description: When using the front or rear camera, accept is video | media
camera.description_zh: 使用前置或者后置相机，当 accept 为 video | media 时生效

successStatus.description: The value of the success status (statusCode) of the interface response
successStatus.description_zh: 接口响应的成功状态（statusCode）值

auto-upload.description: Whether to select the file and upload it automatically. If false, you should manually call the submit() method to start the upload
auto-upload.description_zh: 是否选择文件后自动上传。为 false 时应手动调用 submit() 方法开始上传

events.name: success
events.description: Triggered when the upload is successful
events.params: event = { file, fileList,formData } file 为当前选上传的文件，'fileList' 上传图片列表

events.name: fail
events.params: event = { error, file,formData } error 错误信息，file 上传失败的文件

events.name: progress
events.params: event = { response, file } response 上传中响应信息，file 为当前选上传的文件

events.name: chooseerror
events.description: Triggered when the image selection fails
events.params: event = { error } error 选择图片失败的错误信息

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the upload list is modified
events.params: 选中的值 event = { fileList } 'fileList' 上传图片列表

events.name: remove
events.description: Triggered when an image is removed
events.params: event = { file } file: 移除的文件信息

events.name: oversize
events.description: Triggered when the file size exceeds the limit
events.params: event = { file } file: 尺寸超出的文件信息
events.description_zh: 文件大小超过限制时触发

slots.name: preview-cover
slots.description: Customize the content overlaid above the preview area
slots.description_zh: 自定义覆盖在预览区域上方的内容
